feed.title: Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 p.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 9.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 12:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 9.3°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 9.0°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing after midnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Low 8. Forecast issued 11:45 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. Rain at times heavy beginning in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:45 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming west 30 in the evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:45 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
